features: ECO-FRIENDLY & SAFE CANDLE WARMER: With a 50-watt halogen warming bulb (included), the candle warmer lamp provides a safe and eco-friendly way to enjoy candles. No open flame, no smoke, no soot, no pollution, and reducing fire risk. The candle lamp warmer is cleaner and more efficient. An ideal choice for sustainability and safety. Please use at a stable voltage of 110-120V to avoid burning out the bulb.

EFFICIENT & DIMMABLE, SCENT WITHIN MINUTES: The electric candle warmer melts candle and wax from the top down using a 50W GU10 halogen bulb for fast and efficient fragrance distribution. With dimmer control of the aesthetic home decor lamp candle warmer, you can adjust the melting speed. The brighter the setting, the faster it melts. Also, you can set the 2/4/8 hours shut-off function on this candle warmer lamp with timer.

PERFECT HOME DECOR: This candle wax warmer is a stylish combination of a wooden base, metal body, and glass shade, blending classic and modern designs. The wax melts warmer for scented wax serves as delicate and functional decorative lights for bedroom decor, living room decor aesthetic, studies, offices, yoga rooms, and more.

FITS ALL CANDLE SIZES: The distance from the base of this candle warming lamp to the lampshade is 5.5 inches, compatible with Yankee Candles and most different types of jar candles or wax. Under the wooden base, anti-slip pads are added to ensure stability, making you feel safer when using this candle warmer lamp for jar candles. Say goodbye to candle flames and keep your house safe from fire hazards with the halogen bulb.

BEST GIFTS FOR MOM: Show your love to your family, lover, or friends with this house warming gifts new home essential. Elegant appearance and practical performance make these candle lamps birthday gifts for women, mothers day gifts for mom. Ideal for Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, Easter, Graduation gifts，Fathers day gifts, Teacher gifts, Halloween, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas, and Birthday Gifts for Mother.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes a cute decor
reviews.reviewText: I love this! I never have to worry about burnt wick smell again! There are 3 different "heat" or "light" settings. The lowest barely melts it, but I think it is my favorite setting, the candles last longer and I feel like the scent is more potent that way. The high setting melts it too fast, faster than if you were to burn the wick even. I personally believe this setting is too much, I like a slow melt.There are also 3 timer settings - 2h, 4h and 8h. Perfect for those like me, who tend to forget they have something on!The lamp is adjustable, I have fit some pretty tall candles with plenty of room to expand it still. Very lightweight, cam be a plus and a negative. Definately recommend putting somewhere away from kids and pets due to how light it is. I do like that it comes with an extra bulb too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Christmas Gift Winner
reviews.reviewText: Efficient Candle Warming:This lamp does an excellent job evenly warming our candles, all without the need for an open flame. This not only makes our candles last longer but also ensures a consistent and prolonged release of fragrance.Convenient Timer Function:The addition of the timer function is an added bonus. It gives us complete control over how long we want our candles to warm up, creating a personalized experience. Beyond the convenience, it's a practical feature that brings energy-efficiency.Overall Impressions:Our experience with the lamp has surpassed our expectations. The fragrance seems more pronounced compared to using an open flame, and the candles melt in a way that adds an aesthetically pleasing touch. It's become an essential part of our home ambiance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I did extensive research trying to find just the exact one I wanted! I used to burn candles quite often, but stopped doing so. My daughter had given me a great smelling candle this past Christmas and she told me about these candle lamps! I didn’t even know they existed! I got the clear lamp one and it is absolutely beautiful in person! It seems to instantly warm up and I can smell the candle very quickly! The timer snd dimmer work perfectly! It definitely is a great addition to my room! It also came with two light bulbs. I can highly recommend this beautiful lamp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The height adjustment feature allows me to customize the melting speed, while the dimmable option creates a cozy and inviting atmosphere. The included timer is a thoughtful addition that ensures worry-free operation. Great quality, giving the warmer a sturdy and durable feel. The sleek and elegant design adds a touch of sophistication to my living space. Overall, highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasted for about a minute ***UPDATE***
reviews.reviewText: Installed the light bulb, turned the product on, and it worked for less than a minute. After a minute, the lamp turned off and would no longer turn back on. The on/off switch illuminates when I press the power button, but the lamp does not respond. Tried using a different bulb, and nothing. Tried a different power source, and nothing. Am very disappointed, as this was a gift for my parents. Really hope they can make this right.***UPDATE***: After conferring with customer service, they were able to send me a new one, which works great! This was a gift for my parents, so we are all very thrilled with it's performance! It fills a room with its scent, and no flames either! Thank you so much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well, produces a lot of heat
reviews.reviewText: It is very beautiful and melts candles very well. I like the timer function. The bulb is very strong. The circle of warmth provided by the bulb in this lamp extends past the square block you place the candle on. When I use this device, I put a placemat underneath it to protect the table top service underneath.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Meet your home’s best friend
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Did you ever smell a candle that took you right back to a memory but had an outrageous price tag?If you get this product you’ll invest in the best way to preserve the fragrance and surround your entire home with it.It looks elegant, is made out of wood and glass, has a switch with not only a dimmable setting but a timing option (2/4/8h), and will preserve your candles for ever.Honestly beats all the candle warmers I’ve ever bought! I never have to worry about scents when guests come over (recently got flooded and noticed a moldy smell), and can switch fragrances with candles or essential oils as I wish whilst adding a nice light that adds to the room.Biggest plus: I don’t use any chemical sprays anymore that don’t last and are toxicSlight minus: I wish the head was retractable to either get closer to the candle or further.But in all, very good purchase, durable and efficient in many ways

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Burns the bulb out very quickly
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely loved this lamp. It works really well. It's beautiful, and added just what I was looking for to add to my kitchen/dining area. However, it runs through these bulbs like crazy! I got this in July, it is now December and I've had to replace the bulbs at least 3 times. I have a different candle warmer that I got last December and have yet to change the bulb in it. I leave them both on most of the day while I am home and they are both on their highest settings since the rooms they are in are large. I don't see anyone else complaining about this so maybe it is just mine? But i am afraid to get another one from this particular seller even though it is very tempting. The other designs are also very cute.

Gone are the days of worrying about open flames or uneven wax melting. The candle warmer evenly and safely melts my favorite candles, releasing their delightful fragrance throughout the room without any risk.
